datasets.title: MACS J0138 — MAST/HST First Pass (NFW lensing setup)
datasets.description: Precisely the HST cutouts and metadata used for the first MACS J0138 pass, plus the lensing starter configuration (θ_E, pixel scale, WCS centers).

datasets.title: Black Holes — Canonical + SDSS-RM (merged CSV)
datasets.description: Compiled MBH dataset merging canonical anchors (e.g., Kormendy & Ho) with SDSS-RM entries. Used for BH vs GW residual cross-checks.

datasets.title: Gravitational Waves — GWTC-3 event catalog (CSV)
datasets.description: Compact binary coalescence events with masses and distances, normalized for residual analysis.
